title: [Health] Effects of the ketogenic diet on components of the metabolic syndrome: A systematic review and meta-analysis â€” The results revealed the effectiveness of KD and its potential to improve MetS

[Epidemiology] Prospective study: People with metabolic syndrome (MetS) had the highest risk of chronic kidney disease (CKD). Hypertension, diabetes and age were strong indicators, while abdominal obesity and reduced high-density lipoprotein (HDL) were not associated with the incidence of CKD.
